rukus.text: By the fig (or the place Tiin where Nuhâ€™s ship embarked), and the olive (or Zaita in Jerusalam, were Isa-ibni-Maryam received and preached the message of Allah)
and Mount Sinai (where Musa received the message of Allah)
and this city of security (Mecca, where our prophet Muhammed initially received and preached the message of Allah, all these are witnesses that)
We had indeed created man in the best form
then We brought him back as the lowest of those who are low
except those who believed and did righteous works, then for them there is an unfailing reward
Then after this what makes you deny the judgment
Is not Allah the Best Judge, of all the judges
